Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention relates to a peptide comprising or consisting of a sequence of formula I A-B-C-D-E-F-G-H-I (formula I), wherein A is a peptide consisting of three or four basic amino acid residues; B is a peptide consisting of two to four hydrophobic amino acid residues; C is an amino acid residue selected from the group consisting of hydrophobic and basic amino acid residues; D is a peptide consisting of two hydrophobic amino acid residues; E is an amino acid residue selected from the group consisting of hydrophobic and basic amino acid residues; F is a peptide consisting of three amino acid residues selected from the group consisting of glycine and hydrophobic amino acid residues; G is an amino acid residue selected from the group consisting of hydrophobic and basic amino acid residues; H is a peptide consisting of two or three amino acid residues selected from the group consisting of serine and hydrophobic amino acid residues; I is a peptide consisting of two to four basic amino acid resi
